subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
Television
lead_paragraph: The loud martial music CBS Sports used so relentlessly was meant to evoke heraldry. But the Masters is not “Braveheart” and Trevor Immelman is not William Wallace.
snippet: The loud martial music CBS Sports used so relentlessly was meant to evoke heraldry. But the Masters is not “Braveheart” and Trevor Immelman is not William Wallace.
